column1: We are two 6'2 stoners. Roast us!
My ID says 21, but my makeupless face says 15. Burn me to a crisp.
Roast me worse than the chemo did (3x). Type 2 diabetic, heart failure, 26 yo.
I'M BACK!! And it's my birthday so please give me the perfect gift!
Polish on the left, German on the right. Two more drinks and we'll start a war... Bring it.
18 year old me with a big ass forehead
82 pounds, 4 feet and 11 inches tall. You could murder me with your pinkie. (Ps, I'm autistic)
Don't hold back looking for some good roasts
We dare you! Individually and as whole. Just do it.
MyCoworker wishes to be roast by the best of the best!!
Me and my Waifu ready to be roasted. Do your worst.
